biotools.summary:
An R Package for the Analysis of Drug Prescriptions in Electronic Health Care Records and the CPRD prescription electronic healthcare record (EHR) data.
rdrugtrajectory can produce the data structure necessary to perform a mean cumulative function (MCF) over several groups. Having first filtered the cohort for only medication of interest, and MCF plot reveals prescription burden by social-demographic factors, for example by social deprivation scores or whole cohort populations.
